org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel

Class XSSFTextParagraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFTextParagraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<XSSFTextRun> 

    public class XSSFTextParagraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<XSSFTextRun>
    Represents a paragraph of text within the containing text body. The paragraph is the highest level text separation mechanism.(表示包含文本正文中的文本段落。段落是最高级别的文本分隔机制。)

      void addTabStop(double value)
      Add a single tab stop to be used on a line of text when there are one or more tab characters present within the text.(当文本中存在一个或多个制表符时，添加要在文本行上使用的单个制表符。)
      ListAutoNumber getBulletAutoNumberScheme()
      Returns the auto number scheme if this paragraph has automatic numbered bullets, otherwise returns ListAutoNumber.ARABIC_PLAIN(如果此段落具有自动编号项目符号，则返回自动编号方案，否则返回ListAutoNumber.ARABIC_PLAIN)
      int getBulletAutoNumberStart()
      Returns the starting number if this paragraph has automatic numbered bullets, otherwise returns 0(如果此段落具有自动编号的项目符号，则返回起始号，否则返回0)

      • getTextAlign

        public TextAlign getTextAlign()
        Returns the alignment that is applied to the paragraph. If this attribute is omitted, then a value of left is implied.(返回应用于段落的对齐方式。如果省略此属性，则暗示值left。)
        Returns:
        alignment that is applied to the paragraph(应用于段落的对齐方式)

      • setTextAlign

        public void setTextAlign(TextAlign align)
        Specifies the alignment that is to be applied to the paragraph. Possible values for this include left, right, centered, justified and distributed, see TextAlign.(指定要应用于段落的对齐方式。可能的值包括左、右、居中、对齐和分布，请参阅文本Align。)
        Parameters:
        align - text align(对齐-文本对齐)

      • getTextFontAlign

        public TextFontAlign getTextFontAlign()
        Returns where vertically on a line of text the actual words are positioned. This deals with vertical placement of the characters with respect to the baselines. If this attribute is omitted, then a value of baseline is implied.(返回实际单词在文本行上垂直位置的位置。这涉及字符相对于基线的垂直放置。如果省略此属性，则隐含基线值。)
        Returns:
        alignment that is applied to the paragraph(应用于段落的对齐方式)

      • setTextFontAlign

        public void setTextFontAlign(TextFontAlign align)
        Determines where vertically on a line of text the actual words are positioned. This deals with vertical placement of the characters with respect to the baselines. For instance having text anchored to the top baseline, anchored to the bottom baseline, centered in between, etc.(确定实际单词在文本行上垂直放置的位置。这涉及字符相对于基线的垂直放置。例如，将文本锚定到顶部基线、锚定到底部基线、居中等。)
        Parameters:
        align - text font align(对齐-文本字体对齐)

        public java.awt.Color getBulletFontColor()

      • setBulletFontColor

        Parameters:

      • getBulletFontSize

        public double getBulletFontSize()
        Returns the bullet size that is to be used within a paragraph. This may be specified in two different ways, percentage spacing and font point spacing:

        If bulletSize >= 0, then bulletSize is a percentage of the font size. If bulletSize < 0, then it specifies the size in points

        (返回要在段落中使用的项目符号大小。这可以通过两种不同的方式指定：百分比间距和字体点间距：如果bulletSize >= 0，则bulletSize是字体大小的百分比。如果bulletSize < 0，则指定大小（单位为点）)
        Returns:
        the bullet size(子弹大小)

      • setBulletFontSize

        public void setBulletFontSize(double bulletSize)
        Sets the bullet size that is to be used within a paragraph. This may be specified in two different ways, percentage spacing and font point spacing:

        If bulletSize >= 0, then bulletSize is a percentage of the font size. If bulletSize < 0, then it specifies the size in points

        (设置段落中使用的项目符号大小。这可以通过两种不同的方式指定：百分比间距和字体点间距：如果bulletSize >= 0，则bulletSize是字体大小的百分比。如果bulletSize < 0，则指定大小（单位为点）)

      • setIndent

        public void setIndent(double value)
        Specifies the indent size that will be applied to the first line of text in the paragraph.(指定将应用于段落中第一行文本的收件箱大小。)
        Parameters:
        value - the indent in points, -1 to unset indent and use the default of 0.(值-单位为点的单位，-1可取消设置单位并使用默认值0。)

      • getIndent

        Returns:
        the indent applied to the first line of text in the paragraph.(收件箱应用于段落的第一行文本。)

      • setLeftMargin

        public void setLeftMargin(double value)
        Specifies the left margin of the paragraph. This is specified in addition to the text body inset and applies only to this text paragraph. That is the text body inset and the LeftMargin attributes are additive with respect to the text position.(指定段落的左页边距。这是在文本正文插图中指定的，并且仅适用于此文本段落。也就是说，文本正文inset和LeftMargin属性是相对于文本位置的附加属性。)
        Parameters:
        value - the left margin of the paragraph, -1 to clear the margin and use the default of 0.(值-段落的左页边距，-1清除页边距并使用默认值0。)

      • getLeftMargin

        public double getLeftMargin()
        Returns:
        the left margin of the paragraph(段落的左边距)

      • setRightMargin

        public void setRightMargin(double value)
        Specifies the right margin of the paragraph. This is specified in addition to the text body inset and applies only to this text paragraph. That is the text body inset and the marR attributes are additive with respect to the text position.(指定段落的右页边距。这是在文本正文插图中指定的，并且仅适用于此文本段落。即文本正文插入和marR属性相对于文本位置是相加的。)
        Parameters:
        value - the right margin of the paragraph, -1 to clear the margin and use the default of 0.(值-段落的右页边距，-1清除页边距并使用默认值0。)

      • getRightMargin

        Returns:
        the right margin of the paragraph(段落的右页边距)

      • addTabStop

        public void addTabStop(double value)
        Add a single tab stop to be used on a line of text when there are one or more tab characters present within the text.(当文本中存在一个或多个制表符时，添加要在文本行上使用的单个制表符。)
        Parameters:
        value - the position of the tab stop relative to the left margin(值-制表位相对于左页边距的位置)

      • setLineSpacing

        public void setLineSpacing(double linespacing)
        This element specifies the vertical line spacing that is to be used within a paragraph. This may be specified in two different ways, percentage spacing and font point spacing:

        If linespacing >= 0, then linespacing is a percentage of normal line height If linespacing < 0, the absolute value of linespacing is the spacing in points

        Examples: 
        
      // spacing will be 120% of the size of the largest text on each line
      paragraph.setLineSpacing(120);

      // spacing will be 200% of the size of the largest text on each line
      paragraph.setLineSpacing(200);

      // spacing will be 48 points
      paragraph.setLineSpacing(-48.0);
        (此元素指定段落中使用的垂直行间距。这可以用两种不同的方式指定，百分比间距和字体点间距：如果行间距>= 0，那么行间距是正常行高度的百分比如果行间距< 0，那么行间距的绝对值是以点为单位的间距示例： //间距将是每行最大文本大小的120% paragraph.setLineSpacing（120）; //间距将是每行最大文本大小的200% paragraph.setLineSpacing（200）; //空格将是48个点 paragraph.setLineSpacing（-48.0）;)
        Parameters:
        linespacing - the vertical line spacing(行间距-垂直行间距)

      • getLineSpacing

        public double getLineSpacing()
        Returns the vertical line spacing that is to be used within a paragraph. This may be specified in two different ways, percentage spacing and font point spacing:

        If linespacing >= 0, then linespacing is a percentage of normal line height. If linespacing < 0, the absolute value of linespacing is the spacing in points

        (返回段落内使用的垂直行间距。这可以通过两种不同的方式指定：百分比间距和字体点间距：如果行间距>= 0，则行间距是正常行高度的百分比。如果行间距< 0，则行间距的绝对值为点间距)
        Returns:
        the vertical line spacing.(垂直线间距。)

      • setSpaceBefore

        public void setSpaceBefore(double spaceBefore)
        Set the amount of vertical white space that will be present before the paragraph. This space is specified in either percentage or points:

        If spaceBefore >= 0, then space is a percentage of normal line height. If spaceBefore < 0, the absolute value of linespacing is the spacing in points

        Examples: 
        
      // The paragraph will be formatted to have a spacing before the paragraph text.
      // The spacing will be 200% of the size of the largest text on each line
      paragraph.setSpaceBefore(200);

      // The spacing will be a size of 48 points
      paragraph.setSpaceBefore(-48.0);
        (设置段落之前将出现的垂直空白量。这个间距是以百分比或点来指定的：如果spaceBefore >= 0，那么间距是正常行高的百分比。如果spaceBefore < 0，则行间距的绝对值为点间距示例： //段落将被格式化为在段落文本之前有一个空格。 //间距为每一行上最大文本大小的200% 段落.setSpaceBefore（200）; //间距为48点 段落.setSpaceBefore（-48.0）;)
        Parameters:
        spaceBefore - the vertical white space before the paragraph.(spaceBefore -段落前的垂直空白。)

      • getSpaceBefore

        public double getSpaceBefore()
        The amount of vertical white space before the paragraph This may be specified in two different ways, percentage spacing and font point spacing:

        If spaceBefore >= 0, then space is a percentage of normal line height. If spaceBefore < 0, the absolute value of linespacing is the spacing in points

        (段落之前的垂直空白量这可以通过两种不同的方式指定：百分比间距和字体点间距：如果spaceBefore >= 0，则空白是正常行高的百分比。如果spaceBefore < 0，则行间距的绝对值是以点为单位的间距)
        Returns:
        the vertical white space before the paragraph(段落前的垂直空白)

      • setSpaceAfter

        public void setSpaceAfter(double spaceAfter)
        Set the amount of vertical white space that will be present after the paragraph. This space is specified in either percentage or points:

        If spaceAfter >= 0, then space is a percentage of normal line height. If spaceAfter < 0, the absolute value of linespacing is the spacing in points

        Examples: 
        
      // The paragraph will be formatted to have a spacing after the paragraph text.
      // The spacing will be 200% of the size of the largest text on each line
      paragraph.setSpaceAfter(200);

      // The spacing will be a size of 48 points
      paragraph.setSpaceAfter(-48.0);
        (设置段落后面将出现的垂直空白量。这个空间是以百分比或点来指定的：如果spaceAfter >= 0，那么space是正常行高的百分比。如果spaceAfter < 0，则行间距的绝对值是以点为单位的间距示例： //段落将被格式化为在段落文本后有一个空格。 //间距为每一行上最大文本大小的200% paragraph.setSpaceAfter（200）; //间距为48点 paragraph.setSpaceAfter（-48.0）;)
        Parameters:
        spaceAfter - the vertical white space after the paragraph.(spaceAfter -段落后的垂直空白。)

      • getSpaceAfter

        public double getSpaceAfter()
        The amount of vertical white space after the paragraph This may be specified in two different ways, percentage spacing and font point spacing:

        If spaceBefore >= 0, then space is a percentage of normal line height. If spaceBefore < 0, the absolute value of linespacing is the spacing in points

        (段落后面的垂直空白量这可以通过两种不同的方式指定：百分比间距和字体点间距：如果spaceBefore >= 0，则空白是正常行高的百分比。如果spaceBefore < 0，则行间距的绝对值是以点为单位的间距)
        Returns:
        the vertical white space after the paragraph(段落后面的垂直空白)

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(int level)
        Specifies the particular level text properties that this paragraph will follow. The value for this attribute formats the text according to the corresponding level paragraph properties defined in the list of styles associated with the body of text that this paragraph belongs to (therefore in the parent shape).

        Note that the closest properties object to the text is used, therefore if there is a conflict between the text paragraph properties and the list style properties for this level then the text paragraph properties will take precedence.

        (指定此段落将遵循的特定级别文字特性。此属性的值根据与此段落所属的文本正文（因此在父形状中）关联的样式列表中定义的相应级别段落属性来格式化文本。请注意，使用与文本最近的属性对象，因此，如果该级别的文本段落属性和列表样式属性之间存在冲突，则文本段落属性将优先。)
        Parameters:
        level - the level (0 ... 4)(level -level（0.（四）)

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Returns the level of text properties that this paragraph will follow.(返回此段落将遵循的文本属性级别。)
        Returns:
        the text level of this paragraph (0-based). Default is 0.(此段落的文本级别（从0开始）。默认值为0。)

      • setBullet

        public void setBullet(ListAutoNumber scheme,
                      int startAt)
        Set this paragraph as an automatic numbered bullet point(将此段落设置为自动编号的要点)
        Parameters:
        scheme - type of auto-numbering(方案-自动编号类型)
        startAt - the number that will start number for a given sequence of automatically numbered bullets (1-based).(startAt -指定自动编号项目符号序列的开始编号的数字（从1开始）。)

      • setBullet

        Parameters:

      • getBulletAutoNumberStart

        public int getBulletAutoNumberStart()
        Returns the starting number if this paragraph has automatic numbered bullets, otherwise returns 0(如果此段落具有自动编号的项目符号，则返回起始号，否则返回0)

      • getBulletAutoNumberScheme

        public ListAutoNumber getBulletAutoNumberScheme()
        Returns the auto number scheme if this paragraph has automatic numbered bullets, otherwise returns ListAutoNumber.ARABIC_PLAIN(如果此段落具有自动编号项目符号，则返回自动编号方案，否则返回ListAutoNumber.ARABIC_PLAIN)
